meaning: Out of my causeless mercy for them, I dwelling in their hearts, destroy their darkness born of ignorance, with the lamp of pure knowledge.
commentary:
Chapter 10 of Bhagavad Gita states-

Teshamevanukampārthm ahamajānajam tamah|Nāshayāmyātma bhāvastho  jānadeepena bhāsvata.

It is His unending mercy (karuna) and limitless love that makes us realize that we are encircled by illusion. It is this love that creates in us a desire to get out of it.
